channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Crowdstrike blames update for letting bad data slip through causing global tech outage
item.description: Crowdstrike has blamed a bug in an update that allowed its cybersecurity systems to push bad data out to millions of customer computers.

item.title: IOC awards 2034 Winter Games to Salt Lake City. Utah last hosted the Olympics 32 years ago
item.description: Salt Lake City will be an Olympics host again after the IOC formally awarded the 2034 Winter Games to the United States bid.

item.title: Biles, Richardson, Osaka comebacks ‘bigger than them.’ They highlight issues facing Black women
item.description: Naomi Osaka will join gymnastics icon Simone Biles and track and field star Sha’Carri Richardson on the Olympic stage.
